TC-001.Title: Verify SGP Generator Full Responsiveness on Desktop
TC-001.Preconditions: SGP Generator deployed and accessible in UAT environment. Tester has access to a desktop computer with a modern web browser.
TC-001.Dataset: No specific data required; use default landing state.

Steps.Expected Result: SGP Generator is fully usable and visually correct at all tested desktop resolutions.
Steps.Step Description: Open the SGP Generator application in a desktop web browser (e.g., Chrome, Firefox, Edge) at standard resolution (e.g., 1920x1080).
Steps.Step Expected Result: SGP Generator UI loads correctly and is visually aligned.

Steps.Expected Result: SGP Generator is fully usable and visually correct at all tested desktop resolutions.
Steps.Step Description: Resize the browser window to various widths (e.g., 1200px, 1024px, 800px, 600px).
Steps.Step Expected Result: UI elements rearrange or resize appropriately without overlapping or breaking layout.

Steps.Expected Result: SGP Generator is fully usable and visually correct at all tested desktop resolutions.
Steps.Step Description: Interact with all main features (e.g., buttons, forms, navigation) at each resolution.
Steps.Step Expected Result: All features remain accessible and functional at each tested resolution.

TC-013.Title: Carosello Dettaglio Avvenimento - Gestione cache delle card/precompilate su avvenimento
